text: I recently watched Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 and went back to look at some of their press stuff for fun. That's when I found a sketch GOG did on Jimmy Kimmel called Guillermo in Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 which I thought was just a joke for hyping up the movie. But I actually went back to the movie and skipped through it for a couple of minutes, that's when I found a single frame that you can actually see Guillermo in. I know this is pretty stupid but I thought it was pretty funny he was actually in the movie.
title: The heart of the internet
